nodes.text: The Shard of Alderaan was a live-action roleplaying adventure from Live-Action Adventures. The game was designed for ten participants, and lasts three to four hours.
The Shard of Alderaan - a slicer program able to decode Galactic Empire scandocs has been stolen and taken to Tatooine.
The Empire, the Rebel Alliance, and various third parties must meet aboard the Dune Princess. When they are stranded by a sandstorm, they must work to resolve their objectives.
